   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Documentation for airsimneurips
=========================================
This page documents `airsimneurips`_, the python package to be used for `Game of Drones: A NeurIPS 2019 Competition`_.

.. _`airsimneurips`: https://pypi.org/project/airsimneurips/
.. _`Game of Drones: A NeurIPS 2019 Competition`: https://github.com/microsoft/AirSim-NeurIPS2019-Drone-Racing

*****

* :ref:`modindex`
* :ref:`search`
